cloudy.\u82f1\u91ca: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds

grandson.\u82f1\u91ca: the son of your son or daughter

feeling.\u82f1\u91ca: an emotion that you feel, such as anger, sadness, or happiness

race.\u82f1\u91ca: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

drug.\u82f1\u91ca: a medicine, or a substance for making medicines

listen.\u82f1\u91ca: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

lesson.\u82f1\u91ca: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

butter.\u82f1\u91ca: a soft yellow food made from cream or milk, used in cooking and for spreading on bread

middle.\u82f1\u91ca: half of the way through an event or period of time

million.\u82f1\u91ca: an extremely large number of people or things

wheel.\u82f1\u91ca: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

hole.\u82f1\u91ca: an empty space in something solid

refer.\u82f1\u91ca: to mention or speak about sb/sth

velocity.\u82f1\u91ca: the speed of something that is moving in a particular direction

bone.\u82f1\u91ca: one of the hard parts that together form the frame of a human, animal, or fish body

want.\u82f1\u91ca: something that you need or want

examination.\u82f1\u91ca: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one

heroine.\u82f1\u91ca: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave

cricket.\u82f1\u91ca: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks

structural.\u82f1\u91ca: connected with the structure of something

shore.\u82f1\u91ca: the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake

autumn.\u82f1\u91ca: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler

question.\u82f1\u91ca: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

front.\u82f1\u91ca: the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

broadcast.\u82f1\u91ca: a programme on the radio or on television

investigation.\u82f1\u91ca: an official attempt to find out the truth about or the cause of something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

boat.\u82f1\u91ca: a vehicle that travels across water

communism.\u82f1\u91ca: a political system in which the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property

not.\u82f1\u91ca: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

maybe.\u82f1\u91ca: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain
